sourcesContent:
// dark and light themes

export const lightTheme = {
    body:"#FCF6F4",
    text:"#000000",
    fontFamily:"'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif",
    bodyRgba : "252, 246, 244",
    textRgba:"0,0,0",
    transition: "ease-out 4s",
}

export const darkTheme = {
    body:"#000000",
    text:"#FCF6F4",
    fontFamily:"'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif",
    bodyRgba : "0,0,0",
    textRgba:"252, 246, 244",
    transition: "ease-out 4s",
}
